{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Single-board computer |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.friendlyarm.com/index.php?route=product/product&product_id=206 |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = FriendlyARM |model = NanoPi Fire |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = 3 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Samsung;S5P6818;Nexell; |cpu1_cores = 8 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.4 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;KB4G1646D-BCK0; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211E; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2016.01;; |stockos = Linux;4.4.172;Ubuntu 16.04;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, MicroSD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1), |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = MicroSD Card slot, Micro HDMI 1.4a, DVP Camera Interface, RTC w/ battery backup, GPIO, I2C, SPI |addchip = ARM Microcontroller;STMicroelectronics;STM32F030F4;;1;,,, 6A, 1.2MHz Synchronous Step-Down Switcher;MPS;MP2145;;1;,,, 3A, 1.2MHz Synchronous Step-Down Switcher;MPS;MP2143;;3;,,, 1A, 1.5MHz PWM Step-Down DC/DC Converter;Richtek;RT8010;;1;,,, 5.5V, 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy;SY6280;;1;,,, 250mA Low-Dropout Linear Regulator;Richtek;RT9073A;;1;,,, 300mA CMOS LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9193;;4;,,, 150mA LDO Regulator;Micrel;MIC5365;;1;,,, ESD Suppressor Diode;TI;TPD4E05U06;;2; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = pi |defaultpass = pi |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 11/2017 |estprice = 35 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{see also|NanoPi series|List of Single-board computers}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Samsung]] S5P6618 (''Nexell'') @1.4GHz :SoC: Octa-core ARM (Cortex-A53) *Memory: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM (2x [[Samsung]] K4B4G1646D) *Onboard Storage: TF card (64GB)/MMC card slot *Ports: 1x GbE LAN, 1x USB 2.0
==Links of Interest== *[http://wiki.friendlyarm.com/wiki/index.php/NanoPi_Fire3 ''NanoPi Fire3'' on '''FriendlyARM''' Wiki] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/two-tiny-nanopi-sbcs-debut-ubuntu-core-based-friendlycore/ ''New, tiny NanoPi SBCs debut with new Ubuntu Core based FriendlyCore OS'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/11/12/nanopi-fire2a-fire3-boards-released-with-samsungnexcell-quad-octa-core-processors/ ''$NanoPi Fire2A & Fire3 Boards Released with Samsung/Nexell Quad & Octa Core Processors'' on '''CNX|Software''' ]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
